characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway at night. The road is wet, and visibility is low. The self-driving vehicle is following a black sedan closely. A white sedan is seen on the right side, attempting to merge into the lane occupied by the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a close distance to the black sedan ahead, possibly due to heavy traffic. The vehicles speed appears to be consistent, but the proximity to the black sedan suggests a need for caution. The white sedan on the right is attempting to merge into the lane, which may require the self-driving vehicle to adjust its speed or position.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 3 meters away, attempting to merge into the lane occupied by the self-driving vehicle.
